mapper.select: select orgName,address,sum(outMoney)as outMoney,sum(inMoney)as inMoney from ( select org_name as orgName, o.address ,sum(tr.money) as outMoney,0 as inMoney from tx_record tr left join organization o on o.address=tr.to_address where from_address = #{address} and type = 2 group by to_address,orgName union select org_name as orgName, o.address ,0 as outMoney,sum(tr.money) as inMoney from tx_record tr left join organization o on o.address=tr.from_address where to_address = #{address} and type = 2 group by from_address,orgName)t group by address,orgName
select org_name as orgName, address from organization
